data.text: @tripperhead It's time to ask China to intervene. These criminals have to be executed in China.
@amitdas0608 @tripperhead Second that - dad had a CT of 20 when he got he initial phone call and still showed neg on the RAT - that too a pricey brand banitore from Watson’s
@tripperhead Is Mr Nip an ironman or what? First his wife, then his secretary, and he is still -ve? Or, neither his wife nor secretary were actually +ve… 🤔

@tripperhead I'm expert of nothing but I treat #RATs as #PublicHealth tool answer ONE question only when used: Am I infectious or NOT?
vs #PCR answer one #Medical Question (my MD would ask): Have I recently had #Covid19 (even though I might be pre-, during- or post-infectious)?
@IvySinghWong1 @tripperhead And a lot of false negatives especially when it comes to government secretaries.

@tripperhead #WTF 2+ yrs into #Covid19 pandemic, #HKers (incld pep here) still need this //#RAT vs #PCR Reminder:
It is most often a FEATURE of rapid antigen tests (Not a bug) that they become negative even though PCR stays positive//
Words of expert Dr. Mina (MD,PhD.)
https://t.co/5SFStu2RJk
@tripperhead Is there a universal brand of 4 layer masks being distributed to top officials? But not to their drivers, secretaries, helpers or even wives.

@tripperhead Interesting how the secretaries and drivers keep testing positive but not the senior officials. These are remarkable people - complete immunity to quarantine/isolation. We should be grateful for the our amazing leaders in this crisis.
@tripperhead Sounds like a lot of false positives with testing methods known for high levels of inaccuracy.
